examples.en: Let's go for a walk.
examples.ru: Давай прогуляемся. / Пойдём на прогулку. / Пошли погуляем.

examples.en: Walk this way.
I'll walk you to your car.
Is it safe to walk here?
He walked to the store.
It's a long walk. Maybe we should get the bus.
examples.ru: Идти пешком очень долго. Наверное, нам надо сесть на автобус.

examples.en: Would you care for a walk?
Don't walk on the wet floor!
I'll join you in your walk.
Is your grandson walking yet?
We went for a walk in the park.
We took a walk after supper.
We like to walk every Sunday
Let's walk round the block.
Grandma's out walking the dog.
Don't look back while you walk.
He had a jaunty walk.
He walked into the ambush.
My shoes squeak when I walk.
The patient cannot walk yet.
examples.ru: Пациент пока что не может ходить.

examples.en: I could not walk any farther.
examples.ru: Дальше идти я уже не мог. / Я не мог больше ступить ни шагу.

examples.en: He took a walk after lunch.
She took a walk in the snow.
She walks with a slight limp
The branches roofed the walk.
He loved walking in the hills.
She can no longer walk unaided.
examples.ru: Она больше не может ходить без посторонней помощи.

examples.en: Does God walk among us?
examples.ru: Идёт ли Бог с нами? / Живёт ли Бог среди нас?

examples.en: She walks 3 miles every day.
examples.ru: Каждый день она проходит пешком три мили.

examples.en: My pen seems to have walked.
examples.ru: Похоже, моей ручке кто-то приделал ноги.
